document.full_text: with eye-tracking technology, a computer user can guide the cursor just by looking at the screen. the technology may have applications for video games and television, too.
document.title: bright ideas: novelties: pointing with your eyes, to give the mouse a break
lines_and_colors: with eye-tracking technology, a computer user can guide the cursor just by looking at the screen. the technology may have applications for video games and television, too.
